mongoUri.description: Uri of the database server to connect to, not including database name (e.g. mongodb://fred@foobar:27017)

databaseName.description: Name of the database containing notification info

oplogName.description: Name of the database containing the oplog

deviceNames.description: List of names of devices to receive notifications from

notification_timeout.description: Time after which notifications are timed out as an integer

notification_icon.description: Icon to display next to notifications

notificationObjectPath.description: Name of dbus notifications object path
